Submitted recommendation: ‚ÄúHello 
I just want to mention Pause for Perspective here in Hyderabad offers individual therapy, group therapy, mindfulness programmes and many more! 
The founder is Aarathi Selvan who is the lead psychologist at Pause for Perspective. 
I have been seeing her for the past 4 years and she is extremely good. Me and my friends recommend her very much. You can check her out on practo as well. Here is the contact number of the office: 7032562301‚Äù
